title: Police Raid Moscow Gay Bars After Court Labels LGBTQ+ Movement ‘Extremist,’ Says Local Media
description: Police searched venues across the capital, including a nightclub, a male sauna, and a bar that hosted LGBTQ+ parties, local media reported.

title: U.S. Targets Oil and Natural Gas Industry’s Role in Global Warming With New Final Rule
description: The Biden administration issued a final rule aimed at reducing methane emissions, targeting the U.S. oil and natural gas industry.

title: Israeli Offensive Shifts to Southern Gaza After Collapse of Temporary Truce
description: Israel pounded targets in the southern half of the Gaza Strip on Saturday and ordered more neighborhoods designated for attack to evacuate.

title: Inmate Who Stabbed Derek Chauvin Multiple Times Is Charged With Attempted Murder
description: John Turscak stabbed Chauvin 22 times during the attack, prosecutors said.

title: How Shabbat Brings Israel Together
description: A weekly gathering of family and friends is a connective force in Israel today.
